titleStmt.title: A dialogue (or familiar discourse) and conference betweene the husbandman and fruit-trees in his nurseries, orchards, and gardens wherein are discovered many usefull and profitable observations and experriments [sic] in nature, in the ordering fruit-trees for temporall profitt ... / by Ra. Austen ...
titleStmt.author: Austen, Ralph, d. 1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Hen. Hall for Thomas Bowman,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
Imperfect: several pages, including t.p., mutilated.
